welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Berlin, a city renowned for its rich history, vibrant culture, and charming atmosphere. We invite you to immerse yourself in all that our city has to offer and enjoy your stay in beautiful Berlin!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Berlin Municipal Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Berlin Municipal Airport, mainly used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mt Washington Regional Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
